frameDefinitions: A Destroyer (a conscious entity) or Cause (an event, or an entity involved in such an event) affects the Patient negatively so that the Patient no longer exists.

This frame consists of words that indicate that an Agent or a Cause affects the position of an Item on some scale (the Attribute) to change it from an initial value (Value_1) to an end value (Value_2).
A Grower endeavors to tend to and influence the environment of Food so as to foster its growth.
A building or location that can be sealed to prevent entrance, the Locale, ceases to be open for use.
An Entity is judged to be sensually pleasing or intellectually interesting to a (generally implicit) Judge.
An Agent works on a Project so that it reaches a more advanced and desirable state.
frameExamples: The company is <t>raising</t> the final dividend from 4.34p to 4.57p, to boost the total by 5.3 percent to 6.36p.
We saw this <t>beautiful</t> boat with the red sails several times
listRoleDefinitions: The conscious entity, generally a person, that performs the intentional action that results in the <fen>Patient</fen>'s destruction.
The entity which is destroyed by the <fen>Destroyer</fen>.
The event or entity which is responsible for the destruction of the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Destroyer</fen> destroys the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Destroyer</fen> destroys the <fen>Patient</fen>.
The person who causes an entity (Item) to change its positon on a scale with respect to some property (Variable).
The scale along which the <fen>Item</fen> ranges in value.
The entity whose position along a scale is being changed.
The force that causes the change.
When the event occurs.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> changes the value of an <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The <fen>Grower</fen> is the agent growing <fen>Food</fen>.

<fex name='Food'>Food</fex> is the item grown by the <fen>Grower</fen>, which can include things not traditionally eaten, like flowers, etc., or items for other consumption-related uses, like medicines, smokables, etc.
When the growing event occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Grower</fen> grows <fen>Food</fen>.
The <fen>Locale</fen> is the entity that ceases to be available for use.
The <fen>Time</fen> of the closure.
The <fen>Place</fen> of the failing locale.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular gradable <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A modifier expressing    the deviation of the implicit value either from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Entity</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The object or idea that undergoes change due to the efforts of the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The individual that brings about the development of the <fen>Project</fen>.
The time at which the progress occurs.
The location at which the the <fen>Project</fen> progresses.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The subsequent explosions</fex> leveled most downtown office buildings.
<fex>The rain</fex> increased the river's flow rate to an astonishing million gallons per second.
As a result, they raised prices <fex>in Peoria</fex>.
<fex>The other post office</fex> closed so they could build a new one.
The fire department closed <fex>in 2008 </fex> after the city ceased to be incorporated.
Every park closed <fex>in New York City</fex> last week for the fireworks.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: A Few Kind Words and a Loaded Gun
